If you have any problem, describe it and send it to us this is our mail :
This application was developed as part of a challenge proposed by IEEE.
This application ensures safety of limited person and provides the user with all the information that deserve as well as notification in case of problems.
This application is developed by Ben Ticha Mohamed Baha, Hergli Sedki and Jarboui Mohamed Amine, Students at SUPCOM.
